release.action: Renamed project to 'Gldapo'
Changed from Gant build to Maven
Replaced mixin stuff with Gynamo library
Refactored significantly to make more Spring friendly
Schema filters are now specified with the 'GldapoSchemaFilter' annotation instead of a static property
Schema identifying attributes are now specified with the 'GldapoIdentifyingAttribute' annotation
Templates and schema classes can now be specified in a config script (thanks to new ConfigSlurper in Groovy)
Moved to Groovy 1.1-beta-3
Improved find() to take a map which allows for a more flexible argument list
Fixed sizelimitexceeded exception
Implemented paging
Upgraded to Groovy 1.5.0
Upgraded to Spring LDAP 1.2.1
Major improvements to config based initialization
Improved searching api
Schema objects now make their dn accessible (getDn())
Schema objects now make the directory they came from accessible (getDirectory())
Significant work on the build system
Made the site documentation somewhere approaching passable
Lots of fixes and improvements that I forgot to record at the time :)
Paging is now optional, if the page size is less than 1, paging will not be used
Improved API of gldapo.Gldapo class to be more modular
